name: Clone War
description:
"Clon War" is a game in which you have to survive a fight against an influx of clones.
How long can you survive?

- Let's fight enemies and be strong
The game is played in a roguelike genre, and as the stage progresses, the enemies become stronger.
Clearing the stage will give you a reward and you will grow too.

- Let's dress ourselves up
After the game, you can get the goods based on the results, which you can use when you visit the store.
Let's decorate ourselves with individuality, not only the appearance of the character, but also accessories and effects.

----------

How to manipulate


You can click the ? icon at the top of the title screen to see how to operate it.

Language Settings


You can change the language in the game from Option > Language.

Steam Leaderboard



On the Steam Library page, you can check the ranking by clicking View My Challenges > Full Ranking Table. You can also check it through https://steamcommunity.com/stats/2918600/leaderboards/13279617.
